listing_cancellation_info.cancellation: Cancel up to 95 days before your trip and get a full refund. Cancel within 95 days of the trip and the reservation is non-refundable.

listing.listing_description:
Get a true Costa Rica experience at LunaKai, where open-air living spaces truly immerse you in the lush landscape. The beach is only steps from your door, the surf break at Santa Teresa is 5 minutes away, and restaurants, bars and shops are only a short drive from this laid-back vacation rental.

Listen to the waves lapping at the shore or feel the warm breezes from the villa’s sunny deck, infinity pool or palapa-covered loveseat. A gate at the edge of the private yard leads to the beach; after a swim or some sand-castle building, rinse off in the outdoor shower.

Though the villa’s great room is covered by a roof, its open sides create a seamless indoor-outdoor living space. Sleek modern furnishings, like the matching pair of settees in the sitting area, are a stylish counterpoint to the riot of texture and color on the villa’s oceanfront lot. The kitchen is minimalist but fully equipped, and in keeping with the ambience of breezy luxury, the dining area feels like an extension of the central island.

Three bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms, make LunaKai large enough for a family holiday yet small enough for a honeymoon. Where the main living areas are open-air, the bedrooms are all enclosed and have air conditioning. The master suite has a king bed, al-fresco shower and ocean views, and the other two bedrooms have queen beds.

Though you could easily spend your stay peering into the tidepools or watching the horizon from North Santa Teresa beach, just in front of LunaKai, you’ll hardly need to put on sandals for the 5-minute walk to the more well-known Santa Teresa beach, home to one of the area’s best surf breaks. There’s also a grocery store within walking distance, and dining, shopping and nightlife are all only a 5-minute drive from the villa.

Guests at LunaKai have access to all of Florblanca’s amenities, except the pool and gym facilities. There’s a restaurant, a bar, a spa and yoga/pilates available to the guests with reservations and at extra cost. The five-star luxury hotel is a 2-minute walk from the villa and is the only luxury hotel in the area, and one of the very best in all of Costa Rica.  

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

Discover the best of Puerto Vallarta’s scenery and style at Villa Amapas South. Set on the beach in the Conchas Chinas area, the property has panoramic views over the Pacific and welcoming hacienda-inspired design. Five bedrooms can accommodate up to fourteen guests, but larger parties can reserve neighboring Villa Amapas North for more space.

You’ll want to spend most of your stay on the terrace off the villa’s great room, which has ocean views, a heated infinity pool, plenty of chaise longues, a barbecue and a shaded outdoor dining area. For entertainment, there’s a bar, satellite television, sound system and Wi-Fi, and for convenience, the villa has a water purification system, air conditioning, ceiling fans and an elevator. Your stay at Villa Amapas South includes housekeeping and cook service for breakfast, dinner and happy hour.

The villa’s traditional tiled roof and terracotta-colored walls are matched on the inside by hacienda-inspired earth tones and tiled floors. The great room, which opens to the terrace via wide sliding glass doors, has a large, comfortable sectional and casual wicker armchairs at one end, and a dining area with seating for ten at the other. The fully equipped kitchen has a breakfast bar and welcoming vibe, with stone countertops, a large range and pretty tile backsplashes.

Each of the four main bedrooms at Villa Amapas South has an en-suite bathroom, ceiling fan, access to a terrace and ocean views. On the ground floor, the bedroom has a king bed, and on the second floor, the bedroom has two queen beds and air conditioning. The master bedroom on the third floor has a king bed and air conditioning, and on the fourth floor, you’ll find a bedroom with a queen bed, two single beds and air conditioning. The fifth bedroom is on the ground floor and has two single beds.

Thanks to the villa’s oceanfront location, it’s just a 10-minute walk to Conchas Chinas Beach and Los Muertos Beach. By car, it’s 6.4 km to Playa Camarones and about 10.3 km to Playa de Oro. If you’d like to take advantage of the Mexican sunshine to golf, it’s a 24 km drive to Nuevo Vallarta Golf Course and Mayan Palace Golf Course and an 28.4 km drive to Flamingos Golf Course. Take a stroll around downtown Puerto Vallarta, 10.3 km away, or the Vallarta Botanical Gardens, 21.6 km away. It’s just over 2 km from the villa to the nearest hospital, and 13.1 km to the Puerto Vallarta International Airport.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that Amapas South can be rented together with Amapas North (https://www.luxuryretreats.com/vacation-rentals/mexico/puerto-vallarta/conchas-chinas/villa-amapas-north-115437).

listing.listing_description:
Discover Saving Grace nestled amid lush tropical gardens and swaying palm trees, along the legendary North shore of Providenciales. This spectacular four-bedroom plantation-style manor features beautiful French doors and inviting verandas throughout allowing you to drink in the sweeping ocean views. Leave the real world behind as you stroll down your private path, arriving at a reef-protected beach, or spend unforgettable days basking under the warm Caribbean sun. The good life gets even better, as this villa includes daily housekeeping.

Enjoy the first coffee of the day or host a seafood banquet at the outdoor dining area, shaded by a charming pergola. Brazilian hardwood decking lines the pool terrace where you’ll find a 40 ft heated pool surrounded by designer deck furniture. Seek adventure at the beach, where your water sports hut holds equipment for exploring Grace Bay. When your mission is complete rinse off under your al fresco shower. Shelter yourself from the mid-afternoon sun in a screened-in games room. As dusk settles, sip cocktails around the fire pit, as you watch the sky come alive with stars.

Saving Grace’s warm ambiance is enhanced by understated and tasteful décor. Organic materials, such as wood and wicker, are used throughout to compliment the villa’s natural surroundings. Fresh air and light pour into the great room through sliding glass walls. Get creative in the fully-equipped chef’s kitchen, while your guests relax in a comfortable lounge, across the room. The kitchen features high-end appliances, granite counters and an immense wood-top island. Dine around the elegant wood table or take your meals al fresco.

Saving Grace’s four spacious bedrooms are peaceful, private, and furnished with ultra-cozy beds and linens. The upper-level Master suite opens onto a wraparound veranda where you’ll witness daily sunsets. Its en-suite houses a soak tub and seven-point walk-in shower. The three well-appointed guest bedrooms alternate between ocean view and terrace access. Each bedroom features air-conditioning and a television.

Whether you’ve come to Turks and Caicos for a quiet retreat or a grand celebration, Saving Grace puts you in the perfect position to enjoy the best of the islands. The upscale shops, restaurants and beach clubs of Grace Bay are just minutes away. Spend adventurous days in search of your favorite stretch of beach along Providenciales’ endless coastline. Golf and tennis can be found just a couple miles down the road, and it’s a short 8 mile drive to the airport.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This spectacular beachfront villa is situated on Medano Beach in Cabo San Lucas, with access to the Hacienda Beach Club—one of the finest luxury destinations in Los Cabos. Ample outdoor living spaces fuse with spacious, beautifully decorated interiors to form an enchanting venue for special occasions or serene escapes with loved-ones. Four spacious bedroom suites accommodate families, destination wedding guests, or groups of friends up to eight in size. The vacation rental includes a villa manager, daily housekeeping, and round-the-clock security.

The surface of the infinity pool meshes seamlessly with the vast Sea of Cortez, leading your eye to the iconic rocks of Land's End. Elegant lounge chairs invite you to savor the Los Cabos sun, while the shaded outdoor salon welcomes cool gatherings in the ocean breeze. Prepare delectable lunches in the well-appointed outdoor kitchen, and relish them alfresco on the veranda. Stroll the beach at sunset and return to cocktails around the firepit or by the outdoor hearth. At night, the luminous pool and spa welcome soothing soaks under the Pacific stars.

The villa's interiors balance modern comforts with the antique elegance of Old Mexico. A broad open wall joins the living room and veranda, imbibing the sea-kissed breeze into the home. Kindle a fire in the evening and sip a fine wine in the salon. Try your hand at Mexican culinary arts in the fully stocked, chef-grade kitchen, and gather around the beautiful dining table for a memorable feast.

The master suite features a hand-carved, four-poster king bed opening to a private balcony with breathtaking ocean views, and its ensuite bathroom boasts a lovely soaking tub beside picture windows. Two of the guestrooms have king beds, and one has a pair of twins or split king. Air conditioning, ceiling fans, and high-end entertainment systems keep you cozy during the siesta hour.

Guests at the Hacienda can enjoy the resort's outstanding fitness center, world-class spa, beachfront pools, quarter-mile of dreamy beach frontage, and wonderful dining options including Hacienda Cocina y Cantina. Puerto Paraíso shopping center is within walking distance, and the heart of Cabo San Lucas is less than two kilometers away. Drive eleven kilometers to the Jack Nicklaus Signature Golf Course at Cabo del Sol.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
If you’d like your beach holiday to feature more than sun and sand, look no further than Casa de los Suenos - Santa Teresa. This vacation rental offers views over the lush Costa Rica rainforest to the ocean, pristine surroundings filled with exotic wildlife and easy access to outdoor adventure. The three bedrooms mean you can invite up to six friends and family members to join in—or reserve the whole residence for a tropical honeymoon.

Watch the sun move over the water from outdoor living areas with an infinity pool and loungers, and as it sinks toward the horizon, heat up the barbecue for dinner at the al-fresco table for eight. After dark, play a game on the pool or ping-pong tables, turn on the TV or share snaps of the day’s adventures via Wi-Fi.

Sliding doors separate the villa’s great room from the veranda for a seamless indoor-outdoor feel. The L-shaped open-concept space means you can enjoy the ocean views from the sitting area, a dining table for ten or the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen. A vaulted, wood-paneled ceiling gives the whole space a breezy, welcoming vibe.

Each of the three bedrooms at Casa de los Suenos has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, air conditioning and ceiling fan. Two of the bedrooms open to the terrace, and the third has an al-fresco shower, private balcony and ocean views.

This luxury property is less than a 10-minute drive from some of the area’s best beaches. Try out surfing on the sandy stretch of Playa Santa Teresa or snorkel and swim in the scenic cove of Playa Hermosa. After a day of playing in the water, drive into town for shopping, dining and nightlife—or make the equally short trip to the grocery store and get ready for a quiet evening in.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Bask in the beauty of the Caribbean from this convenient mini-resort on the coast of Grand Cayman, just south of 7-Mile Beach. Watch the sunset over the ocean from the upstairs balcony. Spread a beach towel out on the lush lawns to work on your tan. Or relax inside amongst the air conditioning. Then, walk 2-minutes to Barefoot Cove, the resort’s private beachfront.

Tuscan-inspired architecture mixed with the beautiful Caribbean environment is a recipe for a luxurious and relaxing atmosphere. The privacy of this stand-alone unit will make you feel right at home, but this home is right by the beach. Have family dinners in the formal dining area inside, decorated with designer furnishings and high-end electronics or keep it casual and eat at the picnic table outside by the barbeque.

Private owners mostly populate the Casa Luna Community, so the beach and swimming cove never get too busy. You’ll also have shared access to their ocean-view swimming pool and hot tub, as well as the gym. The villa’s fully equipped kitchen has everything you’ll need to craft amazing meals. After dinner, curl up on the sofa with the kids, make a bowl of popcorn, and pick a movie on Apple TV.

Take the included kayak out past the cove and do a little exploring along the coast where you’ll find Dart Family Park, a great spot for the kids to play in the day time. For dinner out, Grand Old House Restaraunt is just a 5-minute walk, or you could drive into Georgetown, the Island’s capital, for more options. And, if there’s a golfer in the group, the Greg Norman-designed course at the Ritz-Carlton is the best on the Island.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Old Trees 7 is an exquisite beachfront villa on Paynes Bay along the West Coast of Barbados. Part of an exclusive complex of luxury, ocean-view residences, the villa features beautiful living and dining areas and elegant island décor. Its three bedrooms accommodate six people, making it an ideal vacation rental for couples, families, and destination wedding guests.

At Old Trees—which takes its name from the native Casuarina trees on its property—a lagoon-like swimming pool rests between the villas and the shore. Cross a lovely footbridge to reach the secluded beach, where you'll bathe in the turquoise waters and relax on sun loungers in the sand. Upon returning to your residence, linger outdoors on the covered terrace, sipping cocktails on ocean-view loungers and dining at the alfresco table.

From the terrace, three sets of gorgeous French doors invite ocean views and breezes inside. A living room with sumptuous sofas is the ideal setting for spending evening together by the television or piano, or simply enjoying the sunset light. The bright kitchen is fully equipped for preparing delicious drinks and meals, which you'll enjoy at the elegant dining table for six. The naturalistic elegance of the villa's décor, including pickled wooden ceilings and marble floors, accentuates the precious beauty of Barbados. Air conditioning and celling fans will keep you cool on balmy days.

The bedrooms are perfect for private afternoons and serene nights. The master bedroom features a king bed and French doors opening to its ocean-view balcony, along with an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub. The primary guest room also includes a king bed and balcony, along with an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower. The third bedroom, with two twin beds, has a shower/bath combo in its ensuite bathroom.

Along with direct access to Payne's Bay Beach, your villa at Old Trees provides an ideal location for enjoying Barbados. Sandy Lane Beach is a beautiful walk or quick car ride away, while the Sandy Lane Golf and Country Club—the top golf club on the island—is about a mile down the road. For restaurants, nightlife, shopping, and essentials, Holetown and Bridgetown are both minutes away by car.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Overlooking the beautiful sandy beach of Baie Rouge, this stately hillside villa offers breathtaking ocean views from all three of its king en-suite bedrooms. Perfect for an elegant island getaway, villa Beaulieu is adorned with the highest end amenities, sure to satisfy the most discerning luxury travelers. Nearby, you’ll love exploring the many secluded beachfront coves, exciting fusion restaurants, and duty-free shopping in Marigot.

Beaulieu’s white walls, spacious vaulted-ceilings, terracotta floors, and wide archways to the patio display all the classic stylings of a Caribbean beach house. Mix that with state of the art appliances and electronics, and you’ve got an unbeatable destination for your next amazing Luxury Retreat. The vibrant greens of mature palm trees and glowing turquoise ocean views are the focal points of Beaulieu’s every room. You’ll love the feeling the of the fresh ocean breeze, and the warmth of natural sunlight flowing through the interior spaces, drawing you out to Saint Martin’s breathtaking environment.

Once inside Beaulieu’s electric gates, you’ll appreciate the incredible amount of privacy on the estate’s beautifully landscaped, ocean-view patio. You’ll appreciate the outdoor doing and lounge areas, equipped with mosquito traps to keep unwanted visitors away. The heated pool is the perfect place for a quick dip when you don’t feel like hitting the beach. Inside, satellite television, a sound system, and air conditioning will satisfy your tech needs. And, the villa comes with daily housekeeping, a caretaker, and onsite maintenance for anything that may pop up.

The nearest beaches to villa Beaulieu are Baie Rouge, Plum Bay, Cupecoy, and Mullet Bay, all of which are between three and five minutes from home. After you’ve spent a few days enjoying the sand and surf, head into the town of Marigot, known for its duty-free shopping, nightlife, and exciting fusion cuisine. Marigot is the French capital of the island, so you’ll find plenty of quaint cafes and bakeries, as well as fine dining. If you’d prefer to dine-in, pick up something fresh from the Creole Market, and make us of that barbecue on the terrace.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Watch as the sun sets behind nearby islands off the coast of Playa Danta at this breezy beach house in Costa Rica. Walk along the sandy trail, through light greenery and palm trees, to the beach. Work on your tan in a sun lounger on the terrace while the kids splash around in the pool. Later, drive 10-minutes into Potrero for dinner, and maybe a little souvenir shopping.

Ocean-inspired turquoise and nautical pinstripes remind guests of the beauty beyond Casa Azul’s soothing walls. Natural wood and stone elements deliver a rustic-chic feel, while white-walls act like a canvas for an extensive collection of one-of-a-kind regional art. Start your mornings with a soak in the master ensuite’s French rub. Then, sip coffee on the sofa in the terrace lounge. After a few moments to yourself, join the group at the stylish picnic table in the kitchen for breakfast.

Now that you’re ready for an exciting day, walk to Playa Danta, Las Catalina’s main beach. Conditions on Danta are clear and warm throughout the year, making a perfect setting for snorkeling, paddleboarding, and kayaking. When the tide is low, walk across the sand to Playa Danita for a more secluded beach experience. If there’s a golfer in the group, Vista Ridge Golf and Country Club is a challenging course that winds through lush jungle terrain. After, head to Playa del Coco for tropical cocktails at a beachfront bar.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Easy elegance and timeless ocean views make Casa Luca a warm-weather getaway par excellence. Set in the exclusive Pedregal neighborhood above downtown Cabo San Lucas, this beautiful Los Cabos vacation rental is a short walk from a private beach and commands sweeping vistas over the Pacific. Its five bedrooms make it the perfect size to relax or entertain with up to ten friends or family members.

Your stay at this luxury property includes the services of a housekeeper and on-site concierge, who can help arrange activities or give tips on spotting whales from the villa. The expansive outdoor living areas feature a heated infinity pool, hot tub, gas barbecue, lounging and dining areas in the sun and shade, and even a fruit orchard. Inside, you’ll find an exercise room, sauna, satellite Television, sound system and Wi-Fi.

The villa’s colonial-inspired interiors are a mix of traditional refinement and modern charm. Fold-away walls lead to airy, open living and dining rooms with classic beamed ceilings and graceful furnishings. Preparing everything from snacks to feasts is a breeze thanks to the butler’s pantry, prep kitchen and fully equipped kitchen.

Casa Luca has two bedrooms with king beds, two bedrooms with queen beds and one bedroom with two twin beds. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ocean views, and several open to a terrace or the pool area. For larger parties, there is also a queen sofa bed in the study.

Spend your holiday relaxing at the villa or exploring the lively Los Cabos area. There are tennis courts in the Pedregal community, and there are plenty of opportunities to fish, golf, snorkel, sail, drive ATVs and more that the concierge can help you take advantage of. After a day of adventure, take a short walk downhill for a honeymoon-worthy stroll on a private beach while watching the sun set over the Pacific, then head into downtown Cabo San Lucas for a night out at one of its restaurants, cantinas and bars.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Escape the news cycle—and give yourself a beachfront getaway—at Sare. This beautiful modern property has everything—a location on Playa Santa Teresa, stunning contemporary architecture, three bedrooms with space for groups of six—except a television. It’s the ideal place both to get to know the pura vida Costa Rica lifestyle and to reconnect with friends and family.

Spend your holiday listening to the ocean and feeling the breeze drifting through the palm trees from outdoor living areas with a swimming pool, plenty of loungers, a gas barbecue and an al-fresco dining table. While there is no television, there is a Sonos sound system, so you can cue up favorite playlists, and Wi-Fi access, so you can share photos from your trip.

Sare is laid out in a V shape that opens toward the beach, with an open-concept great room in one arm. Fold back the glass wall and let the breeze waft over a sitting area with an inviting sectional, a round dining table and a fully equipped kitchen. A wood-paneled ceiling adds warmth, and a beautifully designed clerestory window floods the space with light.

This luxury vacation rental has two bedrooms with king beds, patio access and beach views, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All three bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, as well as stylish details such as bold wallpaper, colorful accent pillows and wood-paneled ceilings.

While the villa feels like a honeymoon from the everyday, it’s only a 5-minute drive from the nearest grocery store, plus a range of shopping, dining and nightlife options. Its location at the point where Playa Santa Teresa meets Playa Cocal means you can stroll both beaches or walk to nearby Florblanca and enjoy resort amenities from yoga to dining.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This elegant Spanish-Caribbean style villa is designed to capture the views and maximize outdoor living. The covered courtyard entrance with its Old World wooden doors, tiled floors and exotic plantings creates the perfect introduction to a stunning tropical view. Framed by royal palms and pink bougainvillea, the view is a panoramic vista filled with shades of blue from the sapphire sea to the deep blue sky; gorgeous in daytime; spectacular at sunset.

Beautifully designed gardens surround the house and terraces. Epi wood decks on multi levels offer endless options for dining, lounging and sunning. You can be private or together with your friends or family. The upper deck flows off the main indoor living area. Under wide covered gazebos, you can lounge, dine or fire up the barbeque. Step down to the gorgeous lower level for a swim in the inviting pool surrounded by covered terraces and sundecks.

The interior great room, with terracotta floors and dark Spanish style vaulted ceilings, is cool, breezy and light. Pocket doors open to the view. Comfortable oversized seating in white and taupe against dark woods set an elegant, low-key atmosphere for lounging and dining. Spanish inspired doors and windows are featured thought out the house for an exotic touch. The well-equipped new kitchen is sleek and contemporary.

There are four bedrooms. Two are in private casitas off the upper deck. Spacious and comfortable, each room’s décor is a blend of serene whites and tans mixed with dark wood. Charming Spanish style shutters create privacy. Both casita bedrooms have sea and garden views as well as private patios. The gorgeous spa style bathrooms, with walk in showers, are designed in travertine accented with dark woods. Two additional bedrooms connect to the interior living space. It’s a wonderful set up for children. One room has bunk beds. The adjacent room has a king bed. The two share a spa style bathroom.

Although secluded, you’re close to amenities. Long Bay Beach and Cupecoy Beach are only 2 minutes away. It’s also a short drive to Porto Cupecoy for grocery shopping, restaurants including island favorite Mario’s Bistro. Another 5 minutes from here and you reach the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops and galleries, historic buildings and the Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case or Philipsburg’s shopping haven while only a 10-minute drive to the international airport.

Read our insider guide to Hacienda in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/2014/06/vacation-diary-6-friends-enjoy-endless-caribbean-sunshine/)

listing.listing_description:
Follow the wood-deck down to your own slice of Grace Bay Beach at this Bohemian-beach house in Turks and Caicos. Celebrate your honeymoon in a minimalistic setting, only decorated with high-end furnishings and original works of art. Spend your afternoons lounging by the pool or splashing around in the sea. Later, walk over to Turtle Cove Marina and have dinner at one of their seafront restaurants.

Authentic beach houses are increasingly becoming a thing of the past, being replaced by larger, character-less villas and condos. Beach Shack stays true to the original style, embracing the natural elements that you traveled for, not the gadgets you can find anywhere. That said, Beach Shack’s simple ingredients are of the highest quality. The walls are Balinese pearl stone. The ceiling is an exotic teak. And the floors are white coral. Outside, the ocean-front pergola is the perfect place to sip wine with that special someone. Then, sit for a moonlit dinner at the alfresco set on the terrace.

After spending a few days soaking up the solitude of Beach Shack’s private stretch of sand, visit the west-side of Grace Bay Beach for a tour of the area on horseback. While you’re there, consider a snorkeling or scuba diving lesson. The Crystal clear waters of the Caribbean are perfect for first-timers. Boat tours and fishing charters are also available at the marina, as well as private yacht rentals.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

ul.li: Bedroom 1: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, Dual Vanity, Television, Safe, Air conditioning, Pool & ocean view

listing.listing_description:
_ Please note that this property is next to a construction project, please contact us for more details. _

Like an ivory showpiece glinting in the sun, Sandcastle is your private palace right by the sands of the Caribbean Sea. Welcome to sunny Anguilla, a magical island known for its watersports, nightlife and friendly local vibration. Take in the magnificent views of the ever changing hues of the Atlantic Ocean and tropical horizon right at your doorstep. An idyllic boutique villa awaits!

The outdoor oasis at Sandcastle includes an expansive second story infinity swimming pool with plenty of deck seating, beach chairs and umbrellas. The consummate entertainer won’t be able to resist whipping up some fabulous cocktails at the poolside bar with a stellar ocean view. Lovely alfresco dining can be a daily event with a barbeque and outdoor dining set under the shaded lanai. The children will love the fenced in and colorful playground with swings, slide, rock climbing wall and lookout fort. Indoors, you will find a media room and kiddie lounge with Xbox, Wii, movies, games and toys. The villa also includes and exercise room so you can keep on top of your workouts while away.

The vaulted ceilings and bright interiors foster an airy feeling throughout Sandcastle. The interior dining area makes a sophisticated setting in which to share a special announcement with your loved ones or entourage. The gourmet kitchen comes fully equipped with a center island breakfast bar. A black baby grand piano foreshadows moments of musical whimsy in the living area.

Four exquisite bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to eight guests at Sandcastle. A private stairway takes you to the grand master suite with a private balcony. The suite features a king size Tempur-Pedic mattress, a large down sofa for movie nights and an alfresco shower. All of the suites include air conditioning, ceiling fans and televisions.

While your villa sits right on the sands of the picturesque North Coast of Anguilla, you will find an excellent golf course just minutes away. In nearby Sandy Ground, “the entertainment capital of Anguilla,” you will discover a sleepy village by day that lights up at night with imaginative beach bars and hot night spots. Anguilla’s exceptional Caribbean beauty combined with an effortless living experience make the island an ideal getaway destination. Come enjoy the sunshine at this heavenly abode!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Casa Mañana is a gorgeous beachfront gem with five king bedroom suites, situated directly on Palmilla Beach in the Los Cabos Corridor. Built largely of beautiful stone and garlanded with lush flowering vines, the villa enjoys panoramic views of the Sea of Cortez from its ample terraces and luminous interiors. High-end amenities include a swimming pool, hot tub, and gourmet kitchen. Your vacation rental comes with daily housekeeping and continental breakfast, while additional services and activities are available at extra cost. Palmilla Golf Club is just one kilometer away.

The home is designed in exquisite harmony with the landscape and sea, inviting you to savor the open-air pleasures of Baja Sur. An ample swimming pool runs along the side of the house, with a hot tub perched at the beachfront end—the perfect theater for admiring the sparkling sea or starry sky. Lovely parasols cast gentle shade over stylish lounge chairs, while the spacious veranda offers a cool retreat for alfresco meals and home-made cocktails.

Wide glass doors inhale the sea-kissed air into the home, creating a seamless flow between the veranda and open-concept interior. This airy, luminous space features a beautiful wood dining table for ten and a lounge with TV and fireplace. The superbly equipped kitchen includes window bars on two sides, easily serving both dining tables. A large, separate media room offers a lovely escape for afternoon downtime or late-night movies, with glass doors opening to an ocean-view balcony. Throughout the villa, cream-toned walls complement the rustic masonry, fine wood accents, and subtle touches of artful flair.

The stunning master suite features a king bed, lounge with fireplace, and ensuite bathroom. Beachfront balconies extend from both the bedroom and bathroom, offering effortless access to the soft sands and welcoming sea. Three of the guest suites are essentially junior master suites: each has a king bed, ocean view, a terrace or balcony, and a deluxe ensuite bathroom. The fifth bedroom features a king bed and access to a hallway bathroom.

From this prime location, you're just seven kilometers from the bohemian-chic charm and colonial beauty of San José del Cabo, and ten kilometers from Costa Azul. Golfers are minutes from Palmilla Golf Club and a short drive from Querencia.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Casa Stella is a spectacular Los Cabos villa in Pedgregal, a prestigious and secure enclave just outside Cabo San Lucas. Situated at the southern tip of Baja Sur, the lofty home gazes out on a vast panorama of ocean—just where the Sea of Cortez meets the Pacific. Expansive outdoor living areas include an infinity swimming pool, hot tub, kitchen area with bar, and alfresco dining, while the modern, beautifully furnished interiors include a gourmet kitchen, home theater, gym, and more. Ideal for destination wedding guests or a large reunions with loved-ones, the villa features ten ample bedrooms suites, including nine with king beds.

The terrace inspires long days and evenings in the open air of Los Cabos. Bask in the sunlight on lovely lounge chairs while gazing at the horizon, and plunge into the refreshing pool. Fire up the barbecue in the afternoon, and gather for alfresco meals in the enchanting breeze. Savor a soothing soak in the hot tub during the majestic sunset, and savor home-made cocktails by the fire pit under the stars.

The interior great room opens to the terrace through large glass doors, inviting the views and breezes into the home. A fireplace warms the main lounge, while a halo chandelier illuminates your nighttime gatherings. The dining tables seats ten on elegantly upholstered chairs—a superb venue for memorable meals. The kitchen is a cook's dream, with chef-grade appliances and generous marble countertops. A variety of deluxe services are available to elevate your experience.

The villa features nine bedroom suites with king beds and one suite with two double-size beds. One of the king suites additionally includes a queen-size sofa bed. Each room features an ensuite bathroom, and most of the rooms open to a balcony or terrace. The master suite includes a walk-in closet, a deluxe bathroom with tub and steam shower, and a large furnished private balcony with ocean views.

Casa Stella offers an ideal balance of secure serenity and convenient proximity to a wide range of activities and nightlife spots. The famous Divorce Beach and downtown Cabo San Lucas are just three kilometers away, and you're within minutes of the Marina and the iconic El Arco. Golfers are an easy drive to Cabo del Sol.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Fiery sunsets over the ocean—best enjoyed from your private balcony, a shared rooftop terrace or the beachfront lounge—inspired the name of this modern villa in the heart of the Cayman Islands. Its sand and driftwood tones make the turquoise of the waves and the green of the palm trees seem that much brighter. A 6-minute walk will get you to suntans and water sports on top-ranked Seven Mile Beach.

This vacation rental has its own furnished outdoor living area facing the ocean, as well as amenities from a Nespresso machine and wine fridge to a smart TV and Wi-Fi. A daily breakfast buffet is included in your holiday, and guests are welcome at the resort’s shared pools, fitness center, rooftop terrace, restaurants, and children’s program.

Bookmatched stone and wicker lanterns make a dramatic statement in the resort’s common areas, and the natural textures continue in the villa’s open-concept great room. Here, sand-hued floors and driftwood-toned furnishings fill living and dining areas separated from the balcony by wall-to-wall glass. Stone is splashed across the breakfast bar, waterfall style, in the fully equipped kitchen.

This luxury property has one master suite with a king bed, terrace, and ocean views; one bedroom with a queen bed and private terrace; and one bedroom with two twin beds. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.

Active guests can join daily yoga and boxing classes at the resort, and borrow bicycles and snorkeling equipment to explore; the rest of the family can book treatments at the spa or relax poolside. The location just outside George Town means you’re a short drive and boat ride from Stingray City and the Kittiwake wreck, where you can see what lives in the island’s clear waters. But the ultimate experience might just be reliving your honeymoon with a stroll on Seven Mile Beach as the sun sets over the water.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
While staying in this Colonial-style villa, you’ll be treated to upscale amenities and views of the Cul de Sac lagoon and ocean. Boasting contemporary decor, this is one of our most modern St. Barts villa rentals. St. Barts has a reputation for being a go-to destination by the rich and famous thanks to its uncrowded white sandy beaches, designer boutiques and prestigious atmosphere.

Enjoy a day of lounging poolside on one of the many stylish sun beds on the terrace, it faces the water and is surrounded by palm trees. If you get warm, go for a dip in the immense pool, or cool off with an alfresco shower. Once the sun sets, this area lights up and is perfect for entertaining—there’s a gas barbecue and an outdoor dining area, as well as a hot tub for soaks under the stars. Start your mornings in the fitness room, and for an extra fee, the concierge can also arrange for spa treatments and child care service. Daily housekeeping (except Sundays and holidays) and linen changes are included with your stay.

Once inside, you’ll still be able to see the ocean from every room of the house. You’ll notice a nautical-themed decor in the living space of this luxury villa, as well as soaring ceilings and island-inspired furnishings. The sleek kitchen is fully equipped with stainless steel appliances including an espresso machine, wine cellar and a dishwasher.

Four air-conditioned bedrooms allows for eight guests to stay here. All rooms are individually decorated and feature en-suite bathrooms with showers, queen-sized beds and televisions with DVD players. They also include private balconies with sitting areas (the fourth room is in a separate bungalow).

But the highlight of this estate is that it is just a five-minute walk down hill to the lagoon of Cul de Sac and the restaurants that line the beach. You’re also only 8.1 km away from the top-notch restaurants, boutiques and galleries of Gustavia, the island’s bustling capital.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Adam & Eve is a palatial luxury villa in the Leeward Settlement on the beautiful island of Providenciales in Turks and Caicos. With waterfront property along a swimmable canal, the four-bedroom vacation rental features outstanding outdoor and indoor spaces for relaxing and entertaining among family and friends, while its proximity to Grace Bay places you in one of the finest locations on this paradisal island.

Surrounded by lush tropical flora, the villa's unique and spectacular design includes ground-floor and upper-floor verandas overlooking the expansive pool terrace. Enjoy long, luxurious days in the Caribbean sun, bathing in the swimming pool, steeping your body in the hot tub, soaking in the rays on elegant loungers, and sipping cocktails in the cool, covered lounge. In the afternoon, fire up the grill for some delicious barbeque and relish a lovely meal together around the alfresco table.

Multiple sets of French doors open from the pool terrace veranda to the open-plan interior. The lovely living lounge is perfect for evenings by the TV, while the dining table overlooking the pool welcomes you for festive meals together. The light-filled kitchen is fully equipped and includes a breakfast bar for four. The villa's understated but exquisite décor includes subtle but evocative touches of vibrant color and decorative detail that accentuate the pervasive natural beauty of Providenciales.

The villa's bedrooms are enchanting and cozy sanctuaries for couples and guests. The stunning master bedroom features a king bed beneath high, vaulted ceilings, access to the terrace and garden, and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and tub. The primary guest room also has a king bed and terrace access, and shares a bathroom with bedroom four, which has two twin beds. Bedroom three, with queen bed, also opens to the terrace and has an ensuite bathroom.

Beyond your private estate, you're wonderfully situated for enjoying this extraordinary Caribbean island. Grace Bay, Emerald Beach, and Pelican Beach are all within a five-minute drive from your door, while Provo Golf Club, featuring one of the premier courses in the Caribbean, is also a short drive away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Treat yourself to a luxury holiday amid wild scenery at Monkey Villa. Set in the lush forest above Playa Nacascolo, this beautifully appointed vacation rental offers five-star amenities alongside panoramic views of the unspoiled coastline. With beaches, golf, dining and shopping all a short drive away, there’s something for everyone at this Costa Rica retreat.

Listen to the birds singing—and maybe a monkey or two chattering—in the treetops from the villa’s three private balconies, which have sitting and dining areas facing the ocean. Serve refreshments from the wet bar and, as the sun sinks toward the horizon, heat up the gas barbecue for dinner. The property also has features such as Apple TV, Wi-Fi and a wine fridge, and guests are welcome at the community’s two shared swimming pools.

Vaulted ceilings and a wall of windows bring warm breezes and tropical sunshine into the villa’s open-plan great room. A sleek sofa, loungers and dining chairs for six offer plenty of room for friends and family to gather, while artwork and upholstery in shades of vibrant green and orange bring the colors of the landscape inside. The kitchen is fully equipped and has a convenient breakfast bar.

Monkey Villa has two master bedrooms to rival any honeymoon suite, with king beds, en-suite bathrooms, balconies and ocean views. The third bedroom has two queen beds, as well as its own en-suite bathroom, balcony and pool view.

Golfers will love having the Four Seasons golf course less than a 10-minute walk away from the villa’s Papagayo location, while sun-seekers will appreciate the choice of four beaches within a short drive, from Playa Nacascolo to Prieta Beach Club. Find gear for your adventures—or the perfect souvenir—and oceanfront dining in the laid-back beach town of Playa Hermosa. For an unforgettable day trip, make the drive to Rincon de la Vieja Volcano National Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Construction Note:  Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.

Discover a not-so-hidden Costa Rican gem at Villa La Perla. Set near the beach on the lush grounds of the exclusive Los Suenos Resort and Marina, the luxury villa is nevertheless a private tropical oasis in elegant Spanish Colonial style. For couples, there are four suite-style bedrooms spread out over the main house and guest house; for families, there’s a pool plus kid-friendly activities at the resort.

Your stay at Villa La Perla includes access to the Los Suenos Beach Club, Marina and restaurants and bars; you can book tee times at the Los Suenos Golf Course. But you can also choose to simply stay at the villa and revel in the views of the water and garden from a lounge chair on the terrace or a seat at the al-fresco dining area. Kids will love the freeform infinity pool; adults will want to soak in the hot tub. (Younger guests may need supervision for safety, as the villa’s patio leads directly to the pool.) After a day of playing in the sun and sand, try out local specialties on the barbecue and share photos from your vacation via the house’s Wi-Fi.

It may be perfect for tropical vacations for families, but that doesn’t mean Villa La Perla is lacking in flair. From the stately wooden front door to the grand vaulted ceiling in the great room, the villa invites you to make yourself at home in style. Softly textured cream walls and polished stone floors are a Tuscan-inspired backdrop for a roomy sectional in the sitting area and curved-back chairs under a sparkling chandelier in the dining area. Enjoy meals in a more casual setting at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped gourmet kitchen.

There are three bedrooms in the main house at Villa La Perla and one in a guest house. An en-suite bathroom in each of the villa’s bedrooms gives the property all the comfort of a five-star resort. In the main house, the master suite has a king bed and jetted tub, and one other bedroom has its own king bed. The third main-house bedroom has two double beds. In the guest house, you’ll find a bedroom with a king bed as well as a kitchenette.

Book your flight into Juan Santamaria International Airport, 60 minutes from the resort. When you’re at Villa La Perla, going to the beach is as easy as slipping on sandals and walking 5 minutes to Playa Herradura, and golfing is as easy as changing your shoes and walking 10 minutes to La Iguana Golf Course. There’s plenty to explore at Los Suenos, from the beach club to the marina, and beaches like Playa Jaco and Playa Blanco are also within easy driving distance. If you’d like to see more of Costa Rica, plan a visit to the city of San Jose, 60 miles away.

Copyright © 2016 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perched high in the hills of the exclusive Cap Estate, Akasha represents St. Lucia’s premier villa experience. This four storey masterpiece, a temple to sophisticated, ultra-modern design, is unlike any other home you’ll find in the Caribbean. Its lofty vantage point offers stunning views across Pigeon Island National Park to the Caribbean Sea.

Decks and verandas speckle Akasha’s rear facade overlooking the expansive pool terrace. Cool tiles lead you to one of the island’s most opulent infinity pools, whose edges appear to plunge over a cliff into the lush green foliage below. On either side of the terrace are seating areas, one offering a classic teak sun deck, equipped with chaise longues and the other housing a swim-up bar. Either makes the perfect spot to enjoy a sunset cocktail. An outdoor grill, al fresco dining area and living area round out the exterior.

Akasha is ancient Greek for, “pure, fresh air”, and the tasteful, refined interior is built to enhance this feeling. Open-sided rooms, large bay windows, skylights and indoor balconies allow air and light to circulate freely. The chef-appointed kitchen is ideal for preparing a feast or hosting catered events. The living room straddles the line between indoor and outdoor and in the evening reveals a magical view St. Lucia’s lights.

The villa houses six luxuriously-appointed bedrooms, spaced evenly throughout the home and in a separate apartment, providing guests with a sense of privacy. The Master bedroom has a Super King size bed and its en-suite has shower and jetted bathtub.

Akasha is only minutes from St. Lucia’s best 18 holes of golf, as well as numerous sandy beaches, all found on Cap Estate. Rodney Bay, the island’s social centre, is only 5 minutes away. From its marina you can rent a sailboat or organize excursions to Pitons and Sulphur Springs. The town of Gros Islet is where you’ll find upscale shopping, fine dining and nightlife.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Built on the edge of Puerto Aventuras aquamarine, just off the Caribbean Sea, villa Caleta is ready to host your next amazing luxury retreat. Within the resort’s exclusive, gated community, you’ll be just minutes from their on-site shops, restaurants, beaches, and golf course. Inside, this villa boasts an incredible amount of lounge/common spaces, perfect for larger group gatherings like a family reunion, golf trip with friends, or a relaxing corporate retreat. And, with five en-suite-bedrooms Caleta can accommodate up to fourteen guests with ease.

Reminiscent of Beverly Hills mansions, Caleta design is that of the Spanish colonial revivalist style of architecture, with a modern twist on the color scheme and decor. The calming white exterior, terracotta roof tiles, abundance of rich, natural wood grains, and wide openings to the terrace are all trademarks of the luxurious style. Highlighted by the vibrant green of palm trees and a hay-thatched palapa, this private vacation home checks all the boxes of an iconic Mexican luxury rental.

Caleta’s terrace is the perfect place to enjoy the beautiful Mexican climate. Cool off in the infinity pool. Gather with friends around the wet bar. Barbeque some fresh fish from a local market and have lunch on the alfresco dining set. Or, take an afternoon nap in one of the lounge chairs or hammock, it’s up to you. If you’d prefer the air conditioning inside, curl up on the sofa and watch some television or catch up with the world on the villa’s Wi-Fi.

Puerto Aventura is located just off the shore from an incredible coral reef system, rich with aquatic life and ideal for snorkeling, diving, and fishing. There are also plenty of opportunities to learn more about the natural environment with guided tours, dolphin swimming experiences, or a visit to the Bel Air Animal Park. If you feel like doing some exploring, either by car or a chartered boat, there are plenty of beautiful cities and ports to visit up and down the Riviera Maya.

Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
